text: Norberto Oyarbide (1 January 1951 – 1 September 2021) was an Argentine politician and lawyer. He was born in Concepción del Uruguay, Argentina. In 1994, he became an Argentine Federal Judge after being nominated by President Carlos Menem. He retired in 2016. Oyarbide died on 1 September 2021 from problems caused by COVID-19 in Buenos Aires, aged 70. ==References== Category:Argentine judges Category:1951 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Argentine politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Buenos Aires
title: Norberto Mario Oyarbide
